question: Ranthambore was captured by Iltutmish in which of the following years?
explanation:
Iltutmish launched a campaign against the Rajput chiefs. He captured Ranthambore in c.1226 CE and by c.1231 CE,
Iltutmish was successful in establishing his authority over Mandor, Jalore, Bayana, and Gwalior.
